title: 1000th  Win 3 Wins away
body:
Hello, 

So as you probably are aware from the title my **Thousand game win** is very close.  That is alot of games, so needless to say, I have had fun on the way. I was wondering if anyone had any ideas for my 1000th Game win for me. As most people have tried already, Ive had fun with friends, strangers, cheese lanes and Wombo Teams.  Wondering what I could do for the big **1k** Hype. 
Or if anyone wanted to would happily party up with those interested to share this occasion.

replies.body: Add me in game - I'll play!

Is it like, a custom. For rioters to play on Summoners 1000th win?
Because you guys seem to do that a lot.
Because if so I think I better start playing some normals.
custom summoners icon unlocked at 1k victory's......rito please?

Congratulations on the soon to be Milestone Achievement !!!
Keen to hear about the Celebration, regardless of how others may say it's pointless.
This was only a big thing after the game came out because not many people played it that often, the game has been out for 4 years now.
Just play the game, milestones involving number of games are pointless.
